A1\_LocalWeightPositivity.statement: μ-weights must remain \>= 0 unless explicitly marked signed.

A2\_MicroAdjacencyConservation.statement: Local adjacency neighborhoods remain fixed unless explicit REWIRE event declared.

A3\_WeightedAdjacencyCompatibility.statement: Every adjacency pair (i,j) must have a corresponding μ\_ij weight.

A4\_DeltaStability.statement: δ-deformations cannot break μ-positivity nor change adjacency structure.

A5\_PhiPiCompatibility.statement: Φ and Π projections must preserve μ-class structure.
